title: Crash dump (cant play the game)
body: Every time I go to play a game of league the queue and everything else will work fine but as soon as the game launches all i get is an error message asking me if I want to make a crash dump file. I cant reconnect to the game because the message will just keep reappearing and disconnecting me please help . I was able to play last night. I cant even uninstall the game.

replies.body: This is happening to me as well, and I made a post about it not long ago myself. You can make a temporary file which has the error data but that doesnt do any good for the user.

It helps if you say what the error is.

>  I cant even uninstall the game.

Why not?

Have you tried running the repair tool?

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=i3YUeUlw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-06-09T20:06:48.358+0000)
>
> It helps if you say what the error is.
> 
> Why not?
> 
> Have you tried running the repair tool?

There is no error number, and when i try to uninstall the game the prompt asking if i want to also uninstall data closes
 if i could post the picture i have i would
